summary: This document outlines the by-laws for the Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation Inc., detailing the structure and responsibilities of the Board of Trustees, the election and duties of officers, and procedures for meetings and amendments. It establishes the governance framework for the Corporation, including the roles of trustees and officers.

keyFacts: The document outlines the governance structure of the Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation Inc.
The initial Board of Trustees consists of Paul Hoffman, Jeffrey Epstein, and Jeffrey Schantz.
Trustees may be elected by written consent and can be removed by majority vote.
The document specifies the roles and responsibilities of the President, Secretary, and Treasurer of the Corporation.
Meetings of the Board of Trustees can be called by the President, Secretary, or a majority of the Board.
